blueskyLogin.title: Connect to BlueSky
blueskyLogin.description: Connect your BlueSky account to sync your data and enjoy the full experience.

tooltip.info: We never store your password. We only use secure authentication tokens provided by BlueSky.
tooltip.noAccount: Don't have a BlueSky account yet?

consentModal.title: Upload Confirmation
consentModal.description: By uploading your Twitter/X files, you confirm that:

conditions.ownership: You are the legitimate owner of this data.
conditions.cnrsUsage: You agree that the provided data will be used by the National Center for Scientific Research (CNRS) as part of the HelloQuitX operation.
conditions.profileCreation: You understand that this data will be used to create your profile on HelloQuitX.

shareModal.title: Share your journey
shareModal.shareText: The X exodus is massive! Don't lose any of your followers. Thanks to #HelloQuitX I've registered {count} new passengers for a journey to #BlueSky & #Mastodon. Join us and automatically find your communities on #January20!

newsletter.title: Stay Informed
newsletter.description: Sign up to follow the project's progress and be notified of new features.
newsletter.subscribe: Stay informed of the next steps of the HelloQuitX project
newsletter.subscribed: You are subscribed to the newsletter!
newsletter.acceptHQX: I want to receive updates from HelloQuitX
newsletter.acceptOEP: I would like to be informed about other initiatives from [On est prêt](https://www.onestpret.com), who supports HelloQuitX

tutorial.title: Step by step tutorial explanation
tutorial.description: Learn how to easily migrate from Twitter/X to Mastodon and Bluesky

upload.title: Import your Twitter/X archive to continue your journey
upload.action: Drop or select your files here
upload.description:
Three data formats are accepted:
- your original X archive if <1GB (in Zip format)
- following.js and follower.js files TOGETHER and unzipped,
- split versions of these files for large archives (following-part*.js + follower-part*.js)

loading.uploading: Please stay on the page, your import is in progress

upload.helpButton: Help with getting your Twitter/X archive
upload.loading-uploading: Stay on the page, import in progress

helpModal.title: How to get your Twitter/X archive?
helpModal.description: To get your Twitter/X archive, follow these steps:
steps: Log in to your Twitter/X account
Go to "More" in the left menu
Click on "Settings and Support" then "Settings and Privacy"
In "Your Account", select "Download an archive of your data"
Twitter/X will send you an email when your archive is ready to download
Once downloaded, you can import the .zip file here
helpModal.note: Note: Twitter/X archive preparation can take up to 24 hours.

errors.fileType: Invalid file type. Please upload either a ZIP file or following.js and follower.js files
errors.invalidCombination: Please upload either a ZIP file, following.js + follower.js, or their split versions (following-part*.js/follower-part*.js)

profile.unlinkConfirmation: Are you sure you want to unlink your {provider} account?
profile.unlinkSuccess: Your {provider} account has been successfully unlinked
profile.unlinkError: An error occurred while unlinking your {provider} account

errors.lastAccount: Cannot unlink your last connected account

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Account
deleteConfirm.message:
Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and will result in the deletion of:

• All your imported data
• All your linked accounts (Twitter/X, BlueSky, Mastodon)
• Your HelloQuitX profile

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.oepNewsletter: Be informed about On est prêt initiatives

modal.title: A problem occured ?
modal.description: Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

mac.step2: The files will be automatically extracted

linux.step3: Choose a destination folder if prompted

ReconnexionOptions.title: Choose how you want to reconnect to your followings

descriptions.automatic: HelloQuittex will reconnect you with all your followers from X for 30 days
descriptions.manual: HelloQuittex will show you in detail the accounts found on Bluesky and Mastodon so you can choose whether to connect or not

stats.bluesky: connections that can be activated on Bluesky and Mastodon
stats.networks: users with at least one connection that can be activated

refreshTokenModal.title: Reconnection Required
refreshTokenModal.description: Your BlueSky session has expired. To continue using the application, please reconnect to your BlueSky account.
